channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP Business Warehouse - Business Planning and Simulation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP Business Warehouse - Business Planning and Simulation

item.title: CVE-2024-39595|2024-07-09T14:54:14.485Z -- sap_se -- sap%20business%20warehouse%20-%20business%20planning%20and%20simulation
item.description: SAP Business Warehouse - Business Planning and Simulation application does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users to modify website content and on successful exploitation, an attacker can cause low impact to the confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-39595|2024-07-09T04:13:49.560Z -- sap_se -- sap%20business%20warehouse%20-%20business%20planning%20and%20simulation
item.description: SAP Business Warehouse - Business Planning and Simulation application does not sufficiently encode user-controlled inputs, resulting in Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This vulnerability allows users to modify website content and on successful exploitation, an attacker can cause low impact to the confidentiality and integrity of the application.

item.title: CVE-2024-39594|2024-07-09T04:10:40.727Z -- sap_se -- sap%20business%20warehouse%20-%20business%20planning%20and%20simulation
item.description: SAP Business Warehouse - Business Planning and Simulation application does not sufficiently encode user controlled inputs, resulting in Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. After successful exploitation, an attacker can cause low impact on the confidentiality and integrity of the application.
